### 新功能建议请去讨论区, 提ISSUE会自动关闭

新功能建议请去讨论区 [https://github.com/BnanZ0/ok-duet-night-abyss/discussions](https://github.com/BnanZ0/ok-duet-night-abyss/discussions)

搜索现有ISSUE:
[https://github.com/BnanZ0/ok-duet-night-abyss/issues](https://github.com/BnanZ0/ok-duet-night-abyss/issues)
